Introduction

POW is a five-member boy group signed with GRID Entertainment. They debuted on October 11, 2023, with the EP "1st EP [Favorite]".

The name POW is more than just a sound; it’s a symbol of their vibrant entry into the music scene. POW represents the explosive sound that marks their debut, aiming to bring a fresh and fun experience to the world.

On July 10, 2023, Yorch joined the start-up company GRID Entertainment as part of a new boy group. On July 31, 2023, the agency revealed the group’s name, POW, and the other four members (Hyunbin, Jungbin, Dongyeon, and Hong) through SNS and launching films.

They released the pre-debut single "Favorite" on September 13, 2023.
